alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PECOS... NORTHWESTERN BREWSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN JEFF DAVIS COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Camp Mitre Peak, or 13 miles east of Fort Davis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Alpine and Alpine-Casparis Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
